title: Krak-On Splat Roller
paragraphs: The Krak-On Splat Roller is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is the Krak-On branded variant of the Splat Roller.
The Krak-On Splat Roller's appearance in each game is based on the default Splat Roller variant from the same game with an added Krak-On branding.
In Splatoon and Splatoon 2, the ink tank strap has a sticker of Krak-On's wordmark and both sides of the roller cylinder have a Krak-On's circular logo each.

In Splatoon 3, the roller frame's purple-and-yellow color scheme is changed to Krak-On's orange-and-blue and it has a white Krak-On wordmark on the left side. A sticker of Krak-On's icon-and-wordmark logo is pasted on the roller's ink tank.
The Krak-On Splat Roller comes in a set with Squid Beakons and the Kraken.

The Krak-On Splat Roller is a collaboration design with the popular Krak-On gear brand! Drop Squid Beakons in your wake as you tear through the stage, and call your comrades into the fray! Then, when the time is right, you can unleash the Kraken! This is a great set for who those who love to ink!(NA)

The Krak-On Splat Roller is a collaboration design with the popular Krak-On gear brand! Drop Squid Beakons in your wake as you tear through the stage, and call your comrades into the fray! Then, when the time is right, you can unleash the Kraken! This is a great set for those who love to paint!(EU/OC)
In Splatoon 2, the Krak-On Splat Roller comes in a set with Squid Beakons and the Baller.

The Krak-On Splat Roller is the product of a collaboration with the popular Krak-On gear brand! Drop a Squid Beakon while rolling around to gather your teammates and coordinate your strike! And there's no fear of being surrounded when you can retaliate with the Baller! Highly recommended for those who like to push forward!

The Krak-On Splat Roller returned in Splatoon 3 in Fresh Season 2023 with an orange and blue design alongside the trademark Krak-On branding stickers. It comes with Squid Beakons and the Kraken Royale. It was revealed alongside the announcement of Fresh Season 2023 on 16 February 2023 and was released on 1 March 2023.

The Krak-On Splat Roller is the product of a collaboration with the popular Krak-On gear brand! And you know what's useful when you're wielding a roller? Dropping a Squid Beakon to call your teammates! Invite them to land on the luxurious carpet of ink you've laid down. Can't find a way past the enemy's defenses? That's when it's time to deploy the Kraken Royale and bulldoze your way in as a giant octopus or squid! If you love nothing more than blanketing the map with your color of ink, this set may be for you!

Krak-On Splat Roller is a combination of Splat and Roller. It has the Krak-On brand name as a prefix to differentiate it from the Splat Roller. It also denotes that the weapon is a collaboration with Krak-On.

スプラローラーコラボ supura rōrā korabo is a combination of either Splat or Splash, and Roller. It also has the abbreviated prefix Collab to separate it from Splaroller and to denote that it is a collaboration. However, unlike the English name, it does not specify the brand Krak-On.

- Fitting of its name, the Krak-On Splat Roller is the first weapon to offer the Kraken special weapon in Splatoon, and the first to offer the Kraken Royale in Splatoon 3. It is also always the first-unlocked weapon with the Squid Beakon.
It is, however, not the first-unlocked weapon with the Baller, which is the Inkbrush Nouveau.
- When Kraken Royale comes up in Judd's advice, the player is equipped with the Krak-On Splat Roller for the Judd's trial.
- It is, however, not the first-unlocked weapon with the Baller, which is the Inkbrush Nouveau.
